txt.en: 'If you plan to hunt any Wargs, make sure to collect their tails, for they make excellent trophies. Tails from larger Wargs are of course preferable.\n\n'Good luck to you, [placeholder]!'
Warg-packs have moved onto the lake's edge of the Whitshaws, killing the moose that roam there.
'Are you ready to ride to the Whitshaws? The Warg-packs await your vengeance!'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
'Ah! Thank you for these trophies. They will fetch a handsome price.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>

The Warg-infested area of the Whitshaws can be reached by speaking with Dudoc in Forlaw.\n\nYou should travel to the plains of the Whitshaws and defeat Warg-packs there, collecting the tails of larger Wargs as you go.
Dudoc is in Forlaw.\n\nYou should return to Dudoc.
